Key Match Events: Khalil Khamsi’s early header was collected safely by China goalkeeper Yan Junling
Hasan Maatouk’s shot hit the crossbar before going into the break
Lui Bin Bin’s effort was punched away by Lebanese custodian Mostafa Matar
China’s Zhang Linpeng forced a save from Lebanon’s goalkeeper
Hasan Srour’s right-footed shot was denied by China’s Yan Junling
China almost came close to breaking the deadlock, but Wu Lei’s close-range effort was cleared off the line by Lebanon’s defense
Post-Match Reflections: Lebanon coach Miodrag Radulovic remained positive, saying it’s a very important point for us especially after a tough defeat against Qatar
China coach Aleksandar Jankovic emphasized the importance of self-reliance, acknowledging the challenge posed by Qatar’s World Cup experience when they take on the hosts next Monday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of a crowd of 14,137
Both sides made late substitutions in search of a decisive goal
Others: Lebanon and Tajikistan will square off in their final group match on Monday facing a similar situation as a win for the either side can take them to the last 16, should Qatar avoid defeat against China
